pkgmetadata.longdescription: Shiny Apps on Crunch // To facilitate building custom dashboards on the Crunch data platform https://crunch.io/, the 'crunchy' package provides tools for working with 'shiny'. These tools include utilities to manage authentication and authorization automatically and custom stylesheets to help match the look and feel of the Crunch web application. The package also includes several gadgets for use in 'RStudio'.
